actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: To provide authorizations for appropriations for the Food and Drug Administration for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations to carry out the functions, powers, and duties of the Food and Drug Administration in amounts not to exceed $190,550,000 for fiscal year 1974, $209,000,000 for fiscal year 1975, and $215,500,000 for fiscal year 1976. Provides that for fiscal years ending after June 30, 1976, there may be appropriated such sums as the Congress may hereafter authorize by law.

titles.title: To provide authorizations for appropriations for the Food and Drug Administration for fiscal years 1974, 1975, and 197.
